item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, September 25, 2024 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. A new semantic chunking approach for RAG (15 points | 5 comments)
2. Show HN: Hosting my website using my own C web server (77 points | 26 comments)
3. Hack GPON – how to access, change and edit fibre ONTs (41 points | 8 comments)
4. On Impactful AI Research (135 points | 21 comments)
5. Understudied protein blobs have global effects on cell biochemistry (18 points | 5 comments)
6. Show HN: OpenFreeMap – Open-Source Map Hosting (683 points | 196 comments)
7. Beyond the route: Introducing granular MTA bus speed data (159 points | 43 comments)
8. Furnace – the biggest multi-system chiptune tracker ever made (19 points | 1 comment)
9. The Calculator that spawned the Microprocessor (2009) (66 points | 17 comments)
10. Move Fast and Abandon Things (379 points | 170 comments)
11. XBill for PalmOS receives an update after 25 years (10 points | 1 comment)
12. Launch HN: Modern Realty (YC S24) – AI Real Estate Agent for Home Buyers (118 points | 238 comments)
13. GSoC'24: Differentiable Logic for Interactive Systems and Generative Music (72 points | 7 comments)
14. A Little History of the Anchovy (21 points | 8 comments)
15. Debian Packaging from First Principles (21 points | 1 comment)
16. Winamp Legacy player source code (637 points | 283 comments)
17. Committing to Rust in the Kernel (150 points | 96 comments)
18. Wasm2Mpy: Compiling WASM to MicroPython so it can run on Raspberrys (53 points | 14 comments)
19. Google Cache is fully dead (203 points | 128 comments)
20. Insights after 11 years with Datomic [video] (3 points | discuss)
21. Twitter/X will let people you've blocked see your posts (158 points | 268 comments)
22. Neat Randomized Algorithms: RandDiag for Rapidly Diagonalizing Normal Matrices (55 points | 4 comments)
23. Show HN: Velvet – Store OpenAI requests in your own DB (32 points | 20 comments)
24. Why are the violins the biggest section in the orchestra? (10 points | 1 comment)
25. Why Most Published Research Findings Are False (2005) (139 points | 162 comments)
26. Hacker plants false memories in ChatGPT to steal user data in perpetuity (118 points | 35 comments)
27. Mkbsd: Download all the wallpapers in MKBHD's "Panels" app for free (24 points | 31 comments)
28. Show HN: JSON For You – Visualize JSON in graph or table views (169 points | 60 comments)
29. Working Turing Machine (42 points | 1 comment)
30. "Creounity Time Machine", the universal date converter for coin collectors (41 points | 2 comments)
